column4: is there a way to tell dpkg or apt to uninstall/rm everything thta has to do with a pakcage? configs and all? so that I can reinstall from scratch?
the purge option.  if you use aptitude, it's sudo aptitude purge <pkg>
is there a way to do it with apt-get ?
well yea.. but you should really use aptitude.. the commands are almost identical.. i think apt-get uses, apt-get remove --purge or something.. check the manual, man apt-get
